currentInterests.title: Applied AI Systems
currentInterests.description: Developing autonomous AI systems that can reason, plan, and interact with the world in useful ways.
currentInterests.focus: Multi-agent architectures, goal-oriented planning, and effective AI integration with existing systems.

currentInterests.title: Complex Systems Theory
currentInterests.description: Studying emergent behaviors in complex adaptive systems with applications to social networks and technological systems.
currentInterests.focus: Network resilience, phase transitions, and computational modeling of complex systems.

currentInterests.title: Cognitive Enhancement Technologies
currentInterests.description: Investigating tools and technologies that can augment human cognitive capacities.
currentInterests.focus: Human-computer interfaces, knowledge systems, and cognitive load optimization.

currentInterests.title: Information Theory and Compression
currentInterests.description: Exploring the fundamental limits of information processing and representation.
currentInterests.focus: Kolmogorov complexity applications, data compression, and information-theoretic approaches to intelligence.

slatedInterests.title: Quantum Computing Applications
slatedInterests.description: Theoretical exploration of practical applications for near-term quantum computers.

slatedInterests.title: Neurosymbolic AI
slatedInterests.description: Combining neural networks with symbolic reasoning for more robust and interpretable AI systems.

slatedInterests.title: Biological Computing
slatedInterests.description: Investigating computation using biological substrates and systems.

slatedInterests.title: Extended Cognition
slatedInterests.description: Philosophical and practical exploration of extended mind theory and its implications.
